{
    partial class EmployeeViewModel : ViewModelBase
    {
        public EmployeeViewModel()
        {
            this.InitializeCommands();
            this.OnInitialize();

        partial void OnInitialize();

        private void InitializeCommands()
        {
            SaveCommand = new DelegateCommand(Save, CanSave);
